job.title: AI Engineer Intern
description: Focused on research and implementation of AI Agent technologies using frameworks such as AutoGen, LangChain, LangGraph, and crewAI.
Built plan-action agents and management agents for autonomous deployment applications.
Collaborated closely with the CEO/CTO, and founding team to develop an AI-powered platform for developers.
Gained hands-on experience with early-stage startup operations and technical stacks including Next.js, GCP, and Cloud Build.

extracurricular.title: Founding Team - Project Manager
description: Created the official branding and logo for Digital Humanities Lab Fulbright, establishing a cohesive and recognizable visual identity across platforms.
Designed social media content and promotional materials to enhance outreach and community engagement.
Planned and executed interdisciplinary digital projects focused on cultural and social impact, including tools for language and identity.
Built a Sino-Nom to Vietnamese Name Meaning Converter to help users interpret traditional Vietnamese names from ancient scripts.
Developed both internal tools and public-facing applications that support educational and research initiatives.
Designed and implemented user-friendly UI/UX with a focus on responsive design and accessibility.
Built backend systems to support dynamic data processing and user interactions across projects.
Collaborated with students, faculty, and researchers across multiple disciplines to drive project success.

education.school: Tran Phu High School for the Gifted
